name: Tina Sonnie
text: The vegan pizza options are so good! Tried the chorizo and it was FANTASTIC

name: Sydney
text: Extremely disappointing visit. However, I should start off by saying that the man who made my pizza and the woman who checked me out were both very helpful, polite, and kind. But that‚Äôs where the pleasant experience ended. I was standing ‚Ä¶More

name: Liz Honey
text: Blaze pizza is amazing. It‚Äôs like chipotle, but for pizza! You can build your own pizza for a very reasonable price with tons of toppings for any pizza lover. Even the pickiest eater could make a delicious pizza. They have really good, high quality, delicious tasting ingredients as well.

name: Alberto Mendez
text: Waiting time is minimized. Great staff. Jack was super helpful explaining how everything works and made it super simple to understand üëç

name: Gregory Adams
text: Excellent food, just as fast as the name says. Get familiar with the menu in line or before arriving

name: Rohan Abraham
text: Pretty delicious. If you like punch this is going to be similar but with different flavors and a different vibe.

name: Hassan Barzani
text: This place is clean and wonderful. Great food in deed! Yummy!

name: Carol Carpenter
text: I ordered delivery.  The pizza arrived in good time and was hot and tasty. I will definitely order again.

name: Peter Senarighi
text: I was in the mood for something different for pizza and this certainly scratched that itch. ‚Ä¶More

name: Antoine Thompson
text: Best Market is never open when you need service for them they've been closed since time pandemic have came out if this is supposed to be that second business welcome mats never open

name: Liz Monson
text: The pizza was great and the service (take out) was exceptional.  Definitely a place to go to in the future.

name: Andrew Allen
text: Food was yummy. Great service and got my food fast even though it was busy. Environment was good in there. Music wasn‚Äôt too loud. Came in with a large group and they handled it well. Pizza was coal fired and crispy. Toppings were all fresh and tasty. Restaurant was clean and bathrooms were also clean

name: Vern Heitzenrader
text: Crew was friendly and treated me well. Pizza was very good - super hot  as advertised!

name: Bhaskar Ravishankar
text:
The wood fired oven pizza here is really great. The staff are very helpful and welcoming and accommodating. The sauce options are great and they have a huge assortment of toppings you can add.
#woodfiredpizza

name: India Reason
text: It's decent . If in the mood for pizza  it hits the spot, nothing spectacular but, good. .A pretty good selection for choices for build your own. Not quite as good as punch but definitely less expensive.. two pizzas two beers 30 bucks not bad.

name: Adam Wilton
text: The food is excellent and the staff is always so nice. I can't give it a perfect score though because I have had times where I have had to wait over 30 minutes just to order because of how busy it gets. I know it is somewhat unfair to ‚Ä¶More

name: DS Jech
text: Fresh ingredients, great tasting and love the crust, not greasy at all! Wood-fired, fast and delicious. Will definitely go again. Highly recommend!

name: Derek Bardini
text: I just tried to order a pizza for delivery at 8:30pm. Took my address, order information and everything and then told me I would have to pick up the order because they close at 9pm.i get it, if you aren't taking orders then don't but don't ‚Ä¶More

name: Coral Dirks
text: Highly recommend! Low price, high-quality ingredients, substantially-sized personal pizza. Fast service. Staff goes out of their way to make the customer feel welcome, even though they have hundreds of students in and out in a day! They ‚Ä¶More

name: Karina Fang
text: For someone who recently found out they have allergies to dairy and wheat, this place is a God send! It was the most delicious, perfect pizza! Cheese was creamy and stringy like a reg. mozzarella, and the crust was thin and crunchy. I am so happy about this place! I will definitely be back! PLEASE never close!!!!

name: Pouria Niknam Vazifeh
text: It‚Äôs a good pizza for the price.

name: Mary Schleis
text: Great pizza. Very customizable. Door at corner

name: Aaron Stockton
text: Great pizza! Friendly helpful staff. It's a college oriented location; even still  we leave happy every visit and keep coming back across town.

name: H. Kaboyow.
text: Best of all piza good staff.

name: bob anderson
text: Super Deals on the Bestest personal pizza around.  U will go backüòÅ

name: Boran Zhao
text: I like the balsamic glazing sause.

name: Dana W
text: Everything you want at one price!  Great pizza, great ingredients and a staff that is polite and friendly.   They make it YOUR way!    You can't go wrong.

name: Garrett Gilmour
text: Great pizza and amazing customer service. I even won a free pizza by guessing how many boxes were behind me on a shelf. Highly recommend this place.

name: Leslie Baker
text: Great quality great taste friendly atmosphere

name: Jeremy Jacobsz
text: My favorite Pizza place easy! Check it out, you can't lose!

text: Amazing custom pizzas.  Pick the crust type, sauce and off to the races with toppings.  Hefty enough to easily have leftovers to take home for another meal.  Great flavors and value.

name: Antoine Baker
text: I Love Pizza and I most definitely Love Blaze you get it made your way just how you want it add extra toppings no problem an no extra charge and they also have Beer for the adults if you a Ninja Turtle like me this is where you need to be!!!!!! Bring the whole Family

name: Jeron Ford
text: Super yummy! Sad there's no military discount though.

name: Tahir Farooqi
text: Amazing, great price for personal pan pizza you choice of toppings. Keep an out for their great coupons on their app.

name: Jeanene Valentine
text: This is great pizza for on the go! Quick and easy to order. Quite tasty too.

name: Abby Hubbard
text: My very favorite restaurant. Kind employees, and cool environment. Plus, you can add as many toppings on your pizza as you want for no extra charge. I highly recommend the dough knots. They are AMAZING!!!

name: Win Lim
text: Pizza is great because I built it myself. The only reason stops me for coming back is the staff are getting rude and impolite, serious attitude problem. Glad it was a grab and go.

name: Dee
text: Love this place! The staff are always super friendly and the food is always good! I had come in with a large order and they were very fast and patient. Would recommend!

name: Madhura Aithal
text: Amazing pizza. Too many customization options and worth the price

name: Florencia Henshaw

text: Choose whatever you want, build your own pizza, and have fun there!üòç

name: Jeffrey LaFavre
text: This place has become my new favorite place before Gopher bball games.  Great pizza, friendly service and reasonably priced.

name: Robert Chaussee

name: Emilie K
text: My first ever Blaze Pizza experience! I didn‚Äôt finish my pizza even though I was so hungry beforehand. I love personal customized pizzas :)

text: Yummy fresh pizza! They also have a great drink selection too!

name: Yusef Kasmani
text: Mmmmmm yes tasters

text: It's different, authentic & tasty pizza.  Light on calories but great on taste buds.

text: Worst pizza place ever...I drove 45 min round trip to to finally arrive home and find out that one of my pizzas is burnt... contacted the company via their website but they never responded back or refunded the money...Their pizza is nothing special either... wont be going there ever a gain...

text: Got my order wrong,  red sauce was a little sweet for my taste,  and the sausage was far too spicy.

name: Nidhi Desai
text: Worth it. You get to pick any amount of toppings for the same price. It's like chipotle but for pizza.  But they also have a some signature pizza topping combinations that can guide you. You can choose one of them and even add or subtract things from that combination!

name: Vaishnavi Soundar
text: Best place for pizza ever. For 10 dollars you can have a build your own pizza which is amazing for vegetarians who love unlimited toppings of vegetables on their pizza. Also, all the cheese. Hands down my favorite pizza place in town! Their ‚Ä¶More

text: A MUST for the pizza lover! Oven baked deliciousness! I love the "build your own" pizza. Reasonable price and unlimited toppings!

name: vignesh sathya
text:
Best pizza I have ever had in my life!!!!
Its two minutes away from my house and I go there every single week atleast once. ‚Ä¶More

name: Ryan
text: Dirty restaurant, gloves weren't properly worn. I have an app that gives me points after eating there. My points dissapeared and I lost points. I asked to have them put back and they refused. Punch Pizza and Dominos are nearby, I recommend them instead.

name: Jujitsu Majors
text: They had amazing pizza amazing customer service and I would deathly go back there again

text: Very good food at a reasonable price. Blood orange lemonade is worth the cost of a drink. Good variety and friendly staff.

Great food.

text: Good service and ok pizza.  Nice light crust, ok choice of toppings. They have gluten free crust as well.

name: Nathan Cruz Rak
text: Blaze is a nice place to grab a pizza, it has free parking within the larger apartment. This has always made it nice to go to since I can drive without worrying about paying for parking.

name: Kenneth Boyd
text: This is a hidden treasure of a pizza place. Definitely recommend if you are in the Minneapolis. The staff is wonderful and the prices are reasonable. Best in the area. Great atmosphere, super friendly staff. It's our go to when we get take away for sure and everyone is always very complimentary when they try it.

name: Greg Doornink
text: Its just fine for me. Build your own is fun, topping selection is good. I like some of the flavors they pump out but overall I wouldn't choose this place to fill my true pizza cravings.

name: Altangerel Sainbayar
text: Best pizza place on campus

name: Ian Heseltine
text: I love a good wood fired pizza and at Blaze it happens in a matter of minutes! All my experiences here with the staff have been great and my food is always delicious.

text: Excellent thin crust pizza! Interesting toppings and tasty drink options

text: Very good place for a quick bite

text: My favorite pizza in the cities!

text: Great build your own pizza place. Fun atmosphere. Bad parking.

text: Great place! A wide variety of topping options including vegan,  gluten,  kosher or meat lover.  You can find whatever you need here.  Oh,  and try the Root Beer! Best I've ever had anywhere!

text: Just got into town thought I'd try this little pizza joint. Definitely worth walking two blocks and -4 degree weather I will eat here again before leaving town.

text: I love Blaze Pizza. My pizza crust ended up getting scorched on the bottom, which is why I‚Äôm just doing 4 stars. The pizza was still pretty good even with it being a little burned.

text: We ordered a pizza with 7 toppings and they got only one of those toppings right. We got a pizza with spicy sauce, pepperoni, and olives. We hate spicy sauce and olives. This pizza was like wet, spicy cardboard. Goodbye forever

name: Michael Lucke
text: Good pizza and reasonable prices. You can often get buy one get one free deals if you search around. I always get a build your own and get tons of toppings. The pesto sauce is really good.

name: Toriano Tatum
text: Love this pizza spot. Love the Unlimited toppings.

name: Emily Amundson
text: 19/10 God himself would eat here.

name: Andrew Craven
text: What some call, "the Chipotle of pizza" I'd say falls a bit short of that. While Punch is fast and a bit fancy, Blaze is fast and relatively basic American pizza. That's actually a bit better than it sounds but I was hoping for greatness.

name: Kate Amell
text: Love the convenience and deliciousness of the fast fired pizza! This location was great minus some cranky kids behind the counter. I get that we are in college territory and people have bad days, but you're at work so you need to drop the attitude when serving customers.

name: Shelley Palumbo
text: Fun casual pizza place. Choose your own toppings as you go through the line. Tables were not wiped off between customers.

name: R Z
text: Loved our first visit; quality food!

name: David Loos
text: This place is honestly amazing.  My fiance and I have been hooked ever since I introduced her to it.  Good prices, portion sizes and quality.  Everything is fresh and you can see the ingredients made in front of you.  Even the dough is prepared fresh daily.  They also have options for everyone including vegan.  Definitely recommend

name: Emery Brush
text: This place was super cool. I came in searching for some decent food on the go, and I got it. Ordering online or in person is easy, and  I loved being able to design my own personal pizza - and they have a lot of great options. The even ‚Ä¶More

text: Fast, reasonable prices, quality ingredients, VEGAN cheese is an option along with VEGAN chorizo.

name: Julie Beauvais
text: I really enjoy the build your own pizza. I don't think I have ever had a bad pizza at Blaze. The salads we're only so-so. The garlic knots didn't have as much flavor as I hoped they would. So I go there for the pizza. The staff are always friendly too.

name: Jack Carlson
text: I've been here a few times and I'm never disappointed! There's nothing wrong about ordering any kind of pizza! It's a great product for an affordable price!! I love that it's right on campus. Plus the variety that you can get here is hard ‚Ä¶More

text: Amazing pizza and the best staff! Love this plase!‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ‚òÜ

text: Vegan and gluten free options! Single stall (gender neutral friendly) bathrooms, parking on the wahu parking garage

name: Andy Kroll
text: Awesome quick personal pizza with a vegan cheese option.

name: kaylie rojas
text: Best employees ever!!!!!!! Delicious food too!:D

name: Melissa McFarlane
text: I was excited to find a place similar to Seattle‚Äôs Mod pizza chain so I ordered from Postmates. I was not at the store to visually assess the toppings to pick so my pizza was a little disappointing. The pizza dough and sauce were good. The ‚Ä¶More

name: Anastasia Rockbell
text: With the ability to craft my own pizzas for a good price this is my favorite pizza place to go to. It also has gender neutral bathrooms!

name: Julie Blau
text: Delicious nice place to eat since we were at M Heath blog

name: Jonathan Leibovich
text: Easily one of my favorite places to eat in stadium village. The pizza is filling and not too expensive. The atmosphere is fun and lively. Importantly, the pizza was not too expensive. I will be eating here for years to come.

name: Thomas Greenhouse
text: Great pizza, plenty of seating and helpful staff

name: Jaana Dean
text: Staff could be more efficient, I don't think they take half HR lunches very serious, alot of people behind the counter doing alot of talking but great pizza

name: Evan Jensen
text: $8 for a build your own personal pizza? What more could you ask for. Good quality topping and cheeses. They have gluten free options as well. They also have a spicy sauce. It may be a bit too spicy for some, but if you ask them to mix the regular and the spicey it's perfect! I highly recommend this place.

name: Eswar Lakshminarayanan
text: Always better than chain stores like dominos. But please avoid high raise crust(thick crust)

text: Great quick pizza. Love it. Service is fun and they work with you to create a masterpiece.

text: I LOVE this place!! Fresh build your own pizzas that taste the same the next day, fresh vegetables and the mozzarella cheese/ homemade barbecue sauce..shut your mouth!! The barbeque chicken is my favorite..guys they will put extra on without a cost..Love the staff!!

name: Nicholas Willette
text: Great place to get pizza if you want a custom Pizza! Pizza is usually pretty good as long as the ingredients you want are actually in stock when you go. ‚Ä¶More

text: Delicious, made to order, thin and chewy pizza.  If you like cheese, then add some of the Ovalini.  It is creamy and just adds a different texture in addition to the normal Mozzarella.

name: Leonard Tao
text: Recent promotion is sweet. 5$ for a half pizza not bad. And there's always a 8.95 all you can eat!

name: Garfield fan 2
text: Pizza subway, good.

name: Andrena Seawood

name: Dyan Sheely
text: Amazing wood fired pizza, each one freshly made to your specifications.. s'mores cookies are worth the entire visit

name: Brandon McCormick
text: Wasn't sure what to expect but I was pleasantly surprised. The staff was helpful and nice. It was awesome to see the quality toppings and options. The pizza was great and I loaded it with toppings. I was also surprised to see how fast it was. Great place!

name: Mohammed Alshebber
text:
Speedy service, irresistible deals, and nice dine-in atmosphere!
The quality and variety of toppings make Blaze Pizza a unique on-campus experience!

name: Richard Dongses
text: The pizzas are always quality here, and the service is always nice and friendly. Location is kept pretty clean. There is ample seating too, which is a plus. This is one of the go-to places when I need to grab a quick bite.

name: Ankana Das

name: Nicholas Kvalheim
text: Blaze pizza is always a fun lunch or dinner option. You are able to make your own pizza with a wide array of toppings. Every combination I have tried has turned out great! Beware, the personal sized pizza is a lot of food!

name: Taras Makarenko
text: Love this place! Great stuff, good pizza!

name: R. W.
text: This is my new favorite pizza place! Love the build your own pizzas, and it's awesome they also offer a gluten free crust (which is delicious!) The staff there don't just make great pizzas, they are pizza artists!

name: Alexander Ramm
text: It's ok. Fast food pizza, basically.

name: Dru Highlights
text: This place is sooooooo good. If I lived in Minnesota I would eat here all the time. Visited from Florida and loved it.

name: Ashley Perry
text: Blaze has some of the best pizza with unbeatable prices. That being said, the service is often horrendous. We‚Äôve been kicked out of the store 20 min before close because their wall clock was off, I‚Äôve been straight up ignored by staff, and ‚Ä¶More

name: Tracey Fredrick
text: Love their pizza. Get one of the glaze sauces put on at the end (the balsamic one is my favorite). The salads are also pretty good. Can be a little slow at times, and lines can get long with all of the students.

text: Depends on the pizza maker. Some give tons on toppings but others skimp out.

name: satoops05

text: I placed an order here through Postmates. The delivery was quick, and I got a good deal on my pizzas through an online promotion, however there were some problems with the order. ‚Ä¶More

text: This place is amazing for one reason to me. The pie is $8-$10 and you can stack whatever you want on it! No stingyness or reluctancy from your server. Tell them what u want and toppings are endless. Dough is super fresh, BEST IF EATEN ON SITE!!

name: Hari Gopalakrishnan

text: My husband and I have been seeking another build-your-own pizza place since our previous favorites closed, and this place did not disappoint. One of the hardest things for us is dietary restrictions with dairy and gluten, but that was no problem here! Yummy pizza, good service, great value. We will be returning!

name: Anthony W.
text: I was thrown off about the style of pizza place it is. That being said it was a great pizza an great price it was way better then expected i will return again.

name: Ellie Greenhouse

name: Mac Moore
text: Fresh quick and made to order

name: Andy Gremillion
text: Pretty dismal experience. Pizza came cold, the brownie was dry, tasted over cooked, and tiny. Not gonna order from this dump again.

text: Pizza is tasty and freshly made. I like the atmosphere and convenience. I think the prices are fair.

text: I recently bought a pizza from Blaze online and when it came, the order was completely wrong. name: Leo Cook

name: Sky Wei

Poor service on Friday night

text:
Best pizza in the area

name: Kitty Key
text: These guys are great! So accommodating for people with food allergies. Everything I have tried has been good. They have a great selection of vegetarian options , good comes fast and cheap.

text:

text: It's awesome to be able to put exactly what you want on your pizza for no extra charge. Nine bucks gets you a very solid sized dinner that is super tasty. The location and feel of the place is great as well.

text: This was sooo good. Would have been 5 stars if the girls working the counter hadn't ignored customers.

text: The build your own pizza was delicious and at around $9. Great place to go to with friends and family with plenty of seating.

name: Daniel Glynn
text: Great spot to grab food right by U of m campus. I met some of my friends from out of town there and we had a great time.

name: Kyra Brask
text: Love Blaze Pizza! Its my favorite pizza place, hands down. So many options for toppings. They also have vegan and Gluten free options. Love it.

text: Although they suffer from having a poor mobile app, the app is necessary to juggle the "flames" and earn/redeem rewards that translate into steep discounts. ‚Ä¶More

text: Good price for artisan, made to order pizza. You can build your own pizza to your liking. Only have soft drinks options. During lunch hour, waiters often walk around making the patrons feel rushed.
